metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39332 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: Nexcloud desktop is the Desktop sync client for Nextcloud. An attacker caninject arbitrary HyperText Markup Language into the Desktop Clientapplication via user status and information. It is recommended that theNextcloud Desktop client is upgraded to 3.6.1. There are no knownworkarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
